file_content.text: Ready when you are.
Hey, you're back. What'd Mandalore ask you to do for him?
Finally, you're back. I was getting tired of winning every hand.
Then maybe you should stop cheating.
How'd it go? What'd Mandalore ask you to do for him?
Just needs me to take over some responsibilities for him, nothing special.
It wasn't really a job.
But I am supposed to have a couple bounties lined up for me.
He asked me to become a Mandalorian. I decided to take him up on it.
I joined the Mandalorians.
Really? That's fantastic!
Smart move. You just made us a lot of friends.
I didn't do it for your approval, Gault.
You can stop sucking up.
You've got that right.
Braden and Soongh would be so proud right now. I know I am!
Joining the Mandalorians is only the beginning.
The Blacklist is waiting.
Thanks, Mako.
I did this for me. Not for a couple of corpses and not for you.
Save it. I don't care.
It's always about you. Whatever.
Nothing that was going to lead to a payoff. I'm done working for praise.
Mandalore was wasting my time.
Now let's see if this trip was a total wash.
What are we looking at?
Supposedly, a bounty from the Blacklist.
Our next job.
It's a Blacklist bounty the other Grand Champions sent my way.
A gift from friends.
Other Grand Champions? Blacklist? I can't believe you let me miss all this!
Some old job from the Blacklist. Hopefully it's appreciated with age.
A big score if we're lucky.
Wait, the Blacklist? So, it's real?
In all the time I spent researching the Great Hunt, I only heard rumors about the Blacklist.
According to the rumors, the only people who know how to place a bounty on the Blacklist are the most major players in the galaxy.
This bounty's pretty sparse on details--just an encrypted holofrequency and the location to call it from: Taris.
Ready to see what those jokers have in store for us?
Warm up the engines; we're heading out.
Always.
I can't wait.
Don't I know it.
I want to make a few stops before we hit the Blacklist.
Not yet.
Following your lead, as always.
Not a lot to go on either way.
Start the flight checks; we're moving on.
It's enough.
Not real trusting folks.
No kidding.
To be fair, they've probably got a lot to lose.
If someone ever did crack the Blacklist, they'd have a lot of dirt on a lot of influential people.
Well, there goes my plan to blackmail half the galaxy. Guess I'm stuck with you two.
It's time to find out what the going rate for a Grand Champion is.
I only care what it pays.
That'll be useful to know if we ever have a falling out.
Oh, please. You couldn't hire a Gamorrean bouncer with your usual take, let alone a Grand Champion.
Pretty good I'd guess. None of those guys looked hurting for credits.
Systems are looking good. Look out, galaxy, here comes the Grand Champion of the Great Hunt!
Here's that Blacklist posting they were talking about. Locked up tight. Do the honors?
This is it, the real deal. I can't believe it.
You know something I don't?
Why?
Welcome to the big leagues, Mako.
We're part of the elite now.
That's such an understatement, you don't even know.
Just pull up the data already.
Fine, sorry. It's just hard to believe.
It's complicated, we can chat all about it on the way to our next job.
I'll fill you in later.
Come on, we've got work to do.
Thank goodness you're back. I was getting lonely for female companionship.
Eww, Gault. Just eww.
I rest my case. So what's the story? The suspense is killing me.
Took you two long enough. You go for a job or a honeymoon?
Nice to see you, too.
Well, somebody better cough up the gory details. The suspense is killing me.
Just lined up a high-profile bounty, that's all.
We've got more work to do.
Mandalore offered me a place in his clan. I accepted.
Well, I'm a Mandalorian now.
Just more garbage about honor and tradition. We won't be working with Mandalore again.
Mandalore was wasting my time.
I wish it would kill you.
That's what I love about working with you, the team spirit.
About time you two got back. What happened?
Well, first we met all the other winners of the Great Hunt, then Mandalore made our friend here part of his clan, then we all got properly sloshed.
Are you serious? Tell me he's just messing with me.
He left out the part where we got more work to do.
He's telling the truth.
Huh, I guess that explains a couple things.
Definitely not what I was expecting.
I was surprised, too.
I can't believe you left me here! It's not like I've spent my whole life wanting to meet these people or anything.
You would have loved it--but I'm sure you had a blast minding the ship.
And you missed it all.
You are such a jerk.
Some friend you are.
Well, while you two were off partying without me, we got a very strange message.
No indication where it's from, and the encryption's so tight I'd die of old age before I crack it.
It's a bounty from the Blacklist.
I know what it is.
Looks like the Blacklist doesn't take any chances.
My eyes only, I guess.
If a slicer could crack the Blacklist, I'd be really disappointed.
Nobody better be cracking it.
Well, first our friend here practically spat in Mandalore's face, then we met the most charming woman, along with some of the other Great Hunt winners.
He's kidding, right? Tell me he's kidding.
Mandalore and I don't see eye to eye, that's all.
He's not kidding.
It wasn't that bad.
Zip it, Gault.
You're a Mandalorian! Braden would be smiling ear to ear if he saw you now.
I can't take you anywhere. Let's just go.
Mandalore's going to be pleased when he takes a look at that... whatever it is.
We've been through some awful stuff, but this goes to the top of my list.
Don't get too far ahead of me... I really don't want to be alone down here.
I thought all the monsters lived in Kaas City.
Wow, we're really meeting Mandalore. This is going to be incredible.
Here are those Blacklist postings they were talking about. Locked up tight. Do the honors?
These two bounties are sparse on details--just encrypted holofrequencies and the locations to call them from. One's Taris, the other's Hoth.
Well, while you two were off partying without me, we got a couple of very strange messages.
No indication where they're from, and the encryption's so tight I'd die of old age before I crack it.
Supposedly, bounties from the Blacklist.
Our next couple of jobs.
They're Blacklist bounties the other Grand Champions sent my way.
A gift from friends.
Two old jobs from some Blacklist. Hope they've appreciated with age.
A big score if we're lucky.
Just lined up a couple of high-profile bounties, that's all.
We've got more work to do.
They're bounties from the Blacklist.
I know what they are.
